doc.field: 52 Business / Calling / Visiting Cards, 20 Pieces of Ephemera, 3 Letters, 3 Envelopes with Postage

In Reference To: Business / Food / Professional / Technology; "Clark's Patent Enamelled Cast-Iron Ware" Advertisement Clipping; Illustrative Map of Shelter Island Newspring Clipping; "J. Palugyay & Sons Press Hungarian Wine Advertisement; "Robert-Houdin Theater 'Genie des Roses' Souvenir Card with 2 Tickets; "Saratoga Geyser Spring, NY" Advertisement Brochure; "Shelter Island Park" Advertisement Postcard from Fred H. Gould, Proprietor; "The Economy Club and Economy Company" Advertisement Post Card; "Valuable Water Privileges For Sale" Newsprint Clipping; "What He Sighed For" Poetry Newspring Clipping; "William Underwood & Company Original Warehouse, 67 Broad Street, Boston," [MA] [Grocer Catalogue]
